page.title: 08COMMUNICATIONS IN KIP VALLEY
page.content:
Roads and a railway form the main transport links in this area. The high,steep,slopes restrict these lines of communication to the lowlands of the coast and the floor of Spango valley. The A742T runs through Spango valley and carries the majority of the traffic. This road has been improved recently by widening and straightening and the removal of dangerous bends giving improved access to the I.B.M. factory.The A78 follows the coast from Gourock and meets the A742T about a kilometer east of Inverkip. The railway is an electric single track which runs from Glasgow Central station to Wemyss Bay station. It runs through Inverkip. There are a lot of tunnels on the route because of the hilly landscape.
.
